prompt: Every image is posted by one user.

canonical_solution:
all u: User | u not in u.follows
}

prompt: Users can see ads posted by everyone,
canonical_solution:
all u: User | (u.sees - Ad) in u.follows.posts
}

prompt: If a user posts an ad then all its posts should be labeled as ads.
canonical_solution:
all u: User | (some u.posts & Ad) implies u.posts in Ad
}

prompt: Influencers are followed by everyone else.
canonical_solution:
all u: User | (Influencer - u) in u.follows
}

all i: Influencer | Day in i.posts.date
}

prompt: Suggested are other users followed by followed users, but not yet followed.
canonical_solution:
all u: User | u.suggested = (u.follows.follows - u.follows - u)
}

prompt: A user only sees ads from followed or suggested users.
canonical_solution:
all u: User | u.sees in (u.follows.posts + u.suggested.posts)
}
